source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE tmp_odbms_arrival_info SET validation_cd = 2
 WHERE store_cd IS NULL 
    OR jan_cd IS NULL
    OR order_quantity IS NULL
    OR arrival_date IS NULL
    OR LEN(store_cd) > 5
    OR LEN(dept_cd) > 3
    OR LEN(jan_cd) > 13
    OR LEN(order_quantity) > 7
    OR LEN(order_date) > 8
    OR LEN(arrival_date) > 8
    OR LEN(exec_date) > 8;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

activities.name: ImportTmp
activities.description: 一時テーブルをインポート

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'INSERT INTO odbms_arrival_info (',
    '    store_cd, dept_cd, jan_cd, order_quantity,',
    '    order_date, arrival_date, exec_date, env_id',
    ') ',
    ' SELECT',
    '    RIGHT(''00000'' + store_cd, 5),',
    '    dept_cd,',
    '    RIGHT(''0000000000000'' + jan_cd, 13),',
    '    order_quantity,',
    '    order_date,',
    '    arrival_date,',
    '    exec_date,',
    '    ''', pipeline().parameters.in_target, '''',
    ' FROM tmp_odbms_arrival_info',
    ' WHERE validation_cd = 1;',
    ' SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;'
)

sink.preCopyScript:
TRUNCATE TABLE odbms_brakeset_info;
TRUNCATE TABLE tmp_odbms_brakeset_info;

activities.name: ValidationCheck
activities.description: バリデーションチェック

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE tmp_odbms_brakeset_info SET validation_cd = 2
 WHERE env_id IS NULL
    OR parent_dept_cd IS NULL
    OR child_jan_cd IS NULL
    OR LEN(env_id) > 4
    OR LEN(parent_dept_cd) > 3
    OR LEN(parent_jan_cd) > 13
    OR LEN(child_dept_cd) > 3
    OR LEN(child_jan_cd) > 13
    OR ISNUMERIC(number_sets) <> 1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

activities.name: ImportTmp
activities.description: 一時テーブルをインポート

sqlReaderQuery.value:
INSERT INTO odbms_brakeset_info (
    env_id ,parent_dept_cd ,parent_jan_cd ,child_dept_cd ,child_jan_cd ,number_sets
) 
SELECT
    env_id,
    parent_dept_cd,
    RIGHT('0000000000000' + parent_jan_cd, 13),
    child_dept_cd,
    RIGHT('0000000000000' + child_jan_cd, 13),
    CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(DECIMAL, number_sets))
  FROM tmp_odbms_brakeset_info
 WHERE validation_cd = 1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

    OR LEN(store_cd) > 5
    OR LEN(jan_cd) > 13
    OR LEN(term_stock) > 10
    OR LEN(dept_cd) > 3;

    '    calc_date,',
    '    RIGHT(''00000'' + store_cd, 5),',

    ' FROM tmp_odbms_stock_info',
    ' WHERE validation_cd = 1;',

)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE tmp_odbms_stock_info SET validation_cd = 4
  FROM tmp_odbms_stock_info AS tmp
 INNER JOIN odbms_stock_info AS inf
    ON inf.store_cd = RIGHT('00000' + tmp.store_cd, 5)
   AND inf.jan_cd = RIGHT('0000000000000' + tmp.jan_cd, 13)
 WHERE tmp.validation_cd = 1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

sink.preCopyScript:
DELETE FROM eai_shop_sale_info WHERE selling_date < CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()), 112);
TRUNCATE TABLE tmp_eai_shop_sale_info;

activities.name: ValidationCheck
activities.description: バリデーションチェック

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE tmp_eai_shop_sale_info SET validation_cd = 2
 WHERE shop_cd IS NULL
    OR jan_cd IS NULL
    OR selling_date IS NULL
    OR LEN(shop_cd) <> 10
    OR LEN(selling_date) <> 8
    OR LEN(jan_cd) > 13
    OR LEN(dept_cd) > 3
    OR ISNUMERIC(selling_cnt) <> 1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

activities.name: ImportTmp
activities.description: 一時テーブルをインポート

sqlReaderQuery.value:
MERGE eai_shop_sale_info AS target
USING (
    SELECT shop_cd, jan_cd, selling_date,
           MIN(dept_cd) AS dept_cd,
           SUM( CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(DECIMAL, selling_cnt))) AS selling_cnt
      FROM tmp_eai_shop_sale_info
     WHERE validation_cd = 1
     GROUP BY shop_cd, jan_cd, selling_date
) AS source ON (
        target.shop_cd      = source.shop_cd
    AND target.jan_cd       = RIGHT('0000000000000' + source.jan_cd, 13)
    AND target.selling_date = source.selling_date
)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET selling_cnt = target.selling_cnt + source.selling_cnt
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (shop_cd, dept_cd, jan_cd, selling_date, selling_cnt, store_cd)
    VALUES (
        source.shop_cd,
        source.dept_cd,
        RIGHT('0000000000000' + source.jan_cd, 13),
        source.selling_date,
        CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(DECIMAL, source.selling_cnt)),
        SUBSTRING (source.shop_cd, 5, 5)
    );
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

activities.name: SetRowsRead
activities.description: 読込行数取得

activities.name: IfRowsRead
activities.description: CSV読込行数により分岐

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE tmp_eai_shop_sale_info SET validation_cd = 2
 WHERE shop_cd IS NULL
    OR jan_cd IS NULL
    OR selling_date IS NULL
    OR LEN(shop_cd) <> 10
    OR LEN(selling_date) <> 8
    OR LEN(jan_cd) > 13
    OR LEN(dept_cd) > 3
    OR ISNUMERIC(selling_cnt) <> 1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

activities.name: ImportTmp
activities.description: 一時テーブルをインポート

sqlReaderQuery.value:
MERGE eai_shop_sale_info AS target
USING (
    SELECT shop_cd, jan_cd, selling_date,
           MIN(dept_cd) AS dept_cd,
           SUM( CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(DECIMAL, selling_cnt))) AS selling_cnt
      FROM tmp_eai_shop_sale_info
     WHERE validation_cd = 1
     GROUP BY shop_cd, jan_cd, selling_date
) AS source ON (
        target.shop_cd      = source.shop_cd
    AND target.jan_cd       = source.jan_cd
    AND target.selling_date = source.selling_date
)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET selling_cnt = target.selling_cnt + source.selling_cnt
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (shop_cd, dept_cd, jan_cd, selling_date, selling_cnt, store_cd)
    VALUES (
        source.shop_cd,
        source.dept_cd,
        RIGHT('0000000000000' + source.jan_cd, 13),
        source.selling_date,
        CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(DECIMAL, source.selling_cnt)),
        SUBSTRING (source.shop_cd, 5, 5)
    );
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE zz_order	
SET	
    zz_order.total = zz_order_sum.total,	
    zz_order.updt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 	
FROM zz_order	
INNER JOIN (	
	select o1.order_id as order_id, sum (o2.qty * gs.price) as total
	 from zz_order o1
	 left join zz_odetail o2 on o2.order_id  = o1.order_id 
	 left join zz_goods gs on gs.goods_cd = o2.goods_cd 
	where o1.shop_cd = '@{pipeline().parameters.shop_cd}'
	 group by o1.order_id
) AS zz_order_sum	
ON zz_order_sum.order_id = zz_order.order_id;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT as count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updt_dt;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alter1
alter1 sink(input(
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		total as long,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['order_id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		order_id = Column_1,
		shop_cd = Column_2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

properties.description: バッチ実行結果を参照し自JOBが当日正常終了していなければ処理続行

activities.name: GetJobStatusGM
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果を参照

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
  FROM batch_exec_rslt_info beri
 WHERE exec_dt = dbo.get_current_exec_dt()
   AND odbms_arriv_gm_in_rslt_cd = '1'

activities.name: CheckJobStatusGM
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果をチェック

vc_log_text.value: 実施済であるため、パイプライン処理を起動しません。
